text: fomes medical Latin word means “tinder, fuel” first used Girolam Fracastoro describe inanimate objects spreading infectious diseases 16th century (preceding germ theory 300+ years). many ways, agent-based stochastic model follows Fracastoro’s framework closely, “essential seeds contagion”.
